name: R5-EventDefinition-R4-EventDefinition
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 EventDefinition into FHIR R4

element.display: A description of when an event can occur

target.display: A description of when an event can occur
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition`

element.display: When the event definition was approved by publisher

target.display: When the event definition was approved by publisher
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.approvalDate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.approvalDate`

element.display: Who authored the content

target.display: Who authored the content
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.author` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.author`

element.display: Contact details for the publisher

target.display: Contact details for the publisher
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.contact` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.contact`

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.contained`

element.display: Use and/or publishing restrictions

target.display: Use and/or publishing restrictions
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.copyright` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.copyright`

element.display: Copyright holder and year(s)
Date last changed

target.display: Date last changed
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.date` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.date`

element.display: Natural language description of the event definition

target.display: Natural language description of the event definition
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.description` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.description`

element.display: Who edited the content

target.display: Who edited the content
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.editor` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.editor`

element.display: When the event definition is expected to be used

target.display: When the event definition is expected to be used
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.effectivePeriod` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.effectivePeriod`

element.display: Who endorsed the content

target.display: Who endorsed the content
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.endorser` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.endorser`

element.display: For testing purposes, not real usage

target.display: For testing purposes, not real usage
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.experimental` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.experimental`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `EventDefinition.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.id`

element.display: Additional identifier for the event definition

target.display: Additional identifier for the event definition
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.implicitRules`

element.display: Intended jurisdiction for event definition (if applicable)

target.display: Intended jurisdiction for event definition (if applicable)
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.jurisdiction` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.jurisdiction`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `EventDefinition.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: When the event definition was last reviewed by the publisher

target.display: When the event definition was last reviewed
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.lastReviewDate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.lastReviewDate`

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `EventDefinition.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Name for this event definition (computer friendly)

target.display: Name for this event definition (computer friendly)
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.name` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.name`

element.display: Name of the publisher/steward (organization or individual)

target.display: Name of the publisher (organization or individual)
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.publisher` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.publisher`

element.display: Why this event definition is defined

target.display: Why this event definition is defined
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.purpose` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.purpose`

element.display: Additional documentation, citations, etc

target.display: Additional documentation, citations, etc.
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.relatedArtifact` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.relatedArtifact`

element.display: Who reviewed the content

target.display: Who reviewed the content
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.reviewer` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.reviewer`

element.display: draft | active | retired | unknown

target.display: draft | active | retired | unknown
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Type of individual the event definition is focused on

target.display: Type of individual the event definition is focused on
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.subject[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.subject[x]`

element.display: Subordinate title of the event definition

target.display: Subordinate title of the event definition
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.subtitle` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.subtitle`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.text`

element.display: Name for this event definition (human friendly)

target.display: Name for this event definition (human friendly)
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.title` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.title`

element.display: E.g. Education, Treatment, Assessment, etc

target.display: E.g. Education, Treatment, Assessment, etc.
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.topic` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.topic`

element.display: "when" the event occurs (multiple = 'or')

target.display: "when" the event occurs (multiple = 'or')
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.trigger` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.trigger`

element.display: Canonical identifier for this event definition, represented as a URI (globally unique)

target.display: Canonical identifier for this event definition, represented as a URI (globally unique)
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.url` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.url`

element.display: Describes the clinical usage of the event definition

target.display: Describes the clinical usage of the event definition
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.usage` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `EventDefinition.usage` - usage has change due to type change: R5 usage markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 usage

element.display: The context that the content is intended to support

target.display: The context that the content is intended to support
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.useContext` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.useContext`

element.display: Business version of the event definition

target.display: Business version of the event definition
target.comment: R5 `EventDefinition.version` maps as Equivalent to R4 `EventDefinition.version`

element.display: How to compare versions
